# STA 199 - Section 3 {#sta199-3 .unnumbered}

**Introduction to Data Science and Statistical Thinking (STA 199-003)**

In Spring 2022, this section of STA 199 is taught by [Prof. Alexander Fisher](https://scholars.duke.edu/person/Alexander.Fisher).

The TAs for the course are Rob Kravec, Camilla Yue, Steven Winter, Shirley Mathur, Margaret Reed, Evan Dragich, Mariana Izon and Shannon Houser.

Go to the [**STA 199 - Section 3 course website**](https://sta199-sp22-003.netlify.app/) for course specific information.
